Name.BusinessNameLine1: NATIONAL FELLOWSHIP BRETHREN RETIREMENT HOMES INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: GRACE VILLAGE'S MISSION IS TO ENABLE OLDER ADULTS TO LIVE TO THEIR FULLEST POTENTIAL IN THE SECURITY OF A CHRISTIAN COMMUNITY.
IRS990.MissionDescription: GRACE VILLAGE'S MISSION IS TO ENABLE OLDER ADULTS TO LIVE TO THEIR FULLEST POTENTIAL IN THE SECURITY OF A CHRISTIAN COMMUNITY. GRACE VILLAGE OFFERS INDEPENDENT LIVING OPTIONS THAT INCLUDE MEALS AND NURSING SERVICES WHEN NEEDED.
IRS990.Description: GRACE VILLAGE OFFERS INDEPENDENT LIVING OPTIONS THAT INCLUDE MEALS AND NURSING SERVICES WHEN NEEDED. GRACE VILLAGE ALSO OFFERS THERAPY SERVICES AND IN HOME NON-MEDICAL SERVICES AS NEEDED.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION HAS AN ESCROW ACCOUNT AND AGREEMENT WITH A LOCAL BANK. GRACE VILLAGE DEPOSITS MONEY RECEIVED BY FUTURE RESIDENTS FOR LIFE LEASE DEPOSITS INTO THIS ACCOUNT. THE MONEY IS HELD IN THE ESCROW ACCOUNT UNTIL THE RESIDENT OFFICIALLY MOVES IN TO GRACE VILLAGE AND BECOMES A RESIDENT OF GRACE VILLAGE.

Form990ScheduleKPartI.DescriptionOfPurpose: REFINANCE PRIOR ISSUES AND BUIL NEW SNF WHICH NUMBERS WILL BE REFLECTED ON RELATED COMPANY'S 990

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, Line 6
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: BOARD MEMBERS APPROVE SIGNIFICANT DECISIONS OF MANAGEMENT.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Members or stockholders electing members of governing body
GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, Line 7a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: BOARD MEMBERS APPROVE SIGNIFICANT DECISIONS OF MANAGEMENT. ALSO BOARD MEMBERS ELECT AND VOTE ON NEW BOARD MEMBERS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Decisions requiring approval by members or stockholders
GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, Line 7b
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: EXTRAORDINARY CAPITAL PROJECTS AND OTHER FINANCIAL AND STRATEGIC DECISIONS HAVE TO BE APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS/MEMBERS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Review of form 990 by governing body
GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11A
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: CFO PREPARES 990. CEO REVIEWS 990 BEFORE IT IS FILED. THE FULL BOARD IS GIVEN A COPY OF THE 990 UPON COMPLETION OF PREPARATION AND FILING.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: GRACE VILLAGE TRIES TO AVOID SITUATIONS THAT COULD POTENTIALLY BE SEEN AS A CONFLICTS OF INTEREST. IF A CONFICT IS FOUND, IT IS DEALT WITH ON A CASE BY CASE BASIS, AND THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS MAKES A DECISION AS TO MATERIALITY OF THE CONFLICT, AND WHETHER TO TERMINATE TRANSACTIONS WITH PARTIES THAT HAVE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST. CONFLICTS OF INTEREST ARE MONITORED AND DEALT WITH AT EVERY LEVEL OF THE ORGANIZATION, FROM HOURLY EMPLOYEES, TO SALARIED EMPLOYEES, TO BOARD MEMBERS.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
NATIONAL FELLOWSHIP BRETHREN RETIREMENT HOMES, INC.
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: SCHEDULE K - PART I - COLUMN (E): THE ISSUE PRICE DOES NOT MATCH THE AMOUNT THAT IS ON FORM 8038 BECAUSE THIS BOND ISSUE WAS TO BENEFIT TWO SEPARATE LEGAL ENTITIES. THE ENTITIES OPERATE AS ONE COMPANY, BUT ONLY 47% OF THE BOND ISSUE WAS FOR NATIONAL FELLOWSHIP BRETHREN RET. HOMES. THE AMOUNT ON LINE A, COLUMN (E) OF $6,157,000 REPRESENTS 47% OF THE TOTAL BOND ISSUE OF $13,100,000. THIS TAX RETURN IS BEING FILED AFTER THE DEADLINE OF NOVEMBER 15, 2010. THE COMPANY FILED FOR AN EXTENSION AND THE EXTENSION WAS APPROVED. I HAVE INCLUDED A COPY OF THE APPROVAL WITH THE RETURN.
